description: Wraps the field types that can be used to search, filter, sort, and/or paginate a collection of elements.
title: CollectionQuery

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

offset.description: Skip the given amount of elements from the beginning of the resulting list after having search/filter/order.

limit.description: Only the given amount of elements from the beginning of the resulting list after having search/filter/order/offset.
